name: OR_CASE_ANES_TYPE
description: The OR_CASE_ANES_TYPE table contains OR management system case anesthesia types.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the anesthesia type within the case.

columns.name: ANESTH_TYPES_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value which indicates the type of anesthesia being administered during the case.

columns.name: ANESTH_LOC_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value which indicates the location of the body where the anesthesia will be administered.
